snippet: The vote in Parliament brought to a close months of legal uncertainty set off by a court ruling that equated the practice with bodily harm and angered many German Jews and Muslims.
abstract: German lawmakers in lower house of Parliament pass legislation ensuring that parents retain right to have their boys circumcised.
lead_paragraph: The vote in Parliament brought to a close months of legal uncertainty set off by a court ruling that equated the practice with bodily harm and angered many German Jews and Muslims.

headline.seo: German Lawmakers Vote to Protect Right to Circumcision
headline.main: German Lawmakers Vote to Protect Right to Circumcision
